dataObjects.title: Indonesian featherback
dataObjects.bibliographicCitation: "Indonesian featherback." Wikipedia, The Free Encyclopedia. 22 Mar 2014, 19:08 UTC. 23 Jun 2014 <http://en.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Indonesian_featherback&oldid=613939626>.
dataObjects.description:
The Indonesian featherback, Chitala borneensis, is a species of knifefish found in Sumatra, Borneo, and the Malay Peninsula.[1]

References[edit]

  1. ^ Froese, Rainer and Pauly, Daniel, eds. (2006). "Chitala borneensis" in FishBase. April 2006 version.
